results.title: Simvastatin induces estrogen receptor-alpha expression in bone, restores bone loss, and decreases ERalpha expression and uterine wet weight in ovariectomized rats.
results.text_hl: More interestingly, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ could increase @GENE_ESR1 @GENE_24890 @@@ERalpha@@@ expression and synergy with @CHEMICAL_Estradiol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004958 @@@estradiol@@@ in bone while antagonizing @CHEMICAL_Estradiol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004958 @@@estradiol@@@ in the uterus, along with @<m>DISEASE_Uterine_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014594 @@@uterus atrophy@@@ and uterine wet weight decreases.

citations.NLM: Li X, Song QS, Wang JY, Leng HJ, Chen ZQ, Liu ZJ, Dang GT, Song CL. Simvastatin induces estrogen receptor-alpha expression in bone, restores bone loss, and decreases ERalpha expression and uterine wet weight in ovariectomized rats. J Bone Miner Metab. 2011 Jul;29(4):396-403. PMID: 21063740
